Title: Root out the Hu Feng counter-revolutionary clique exhibition cartoons 17
Publisher: Shanghai renmin meishu chubanshe (上海人民美术出版社)
Notes: Most of the cartoons of a set of 20 posters, published during the anti-Hu Feng movement, cannot be linked to any of the 17 designers mentioned on the opening sheet. This 17th one, however, has been signed by Ye Qianyu (lower left corner).The person on the right is Hu Feng, drinking from a goblet of "two-sided tricks", while stealing "secrets" from the other person. The person on the left is a corrupt cadre, drinking from a glass of "liberalism" and smoking a cigarette.
